# Homebrew Tap for Glovebox

This is the official Homebrew tap for [Glovebox](https://github.com/joelhelbling/glovebox), a CLI for sandboxed development environments using Docker.

## Installation

```bash
brew tap joelhelbling/glovebox
brew install glovebox
```

Or install directly:

```bash
brew install joelhelbling/glovebox/glovebox
```

## Updating

```bash
brew update
brew upgrade glovebox
```

## More Information

- [Glovebox Repository](https://github.com/joelhelbling/glovebox)
- [Releases](https://github.com/joelhelbling/glovebox/releases)
